reviewText: This was a poorly made film and no where near the original film.  Even adding Richard Roundtree to this film couldn't help it!
I ordered this movie not knowing this movie was renamed it's really one down too to go so I wouldn't recommend this product

Did not have that edge like the initial 3 the hard way, not much of an action plot but just the same a good choice for your 70's soul cinema collection giving the starring legends of Jim " Black Belt Jones"Kelly, Jim "Slaughter" Brown, Fred the Hammer Williams, and Richard " shaft" Roundtree.
